title: Build a Scalable E-commerce API
description: Design and implement a RESTful API for a high-traffic e-commerce platform. Focus on database schema design, authentication, and caching strategies.

title: Real-time Chat Application
description: Create a real-time chat interface using WebSockets. Implement features like private messaging, typing indicators, and message persistence.

title: Task Management Dashboard
description: Develop a productivity dashboard with drag-and-drop task management. Focus on state management and responsive UI design.

title: Authentication System
description: Build a secure authentication system with JWT, OAuth integration, and password reset functionality.

title: Blog Platform with CMS
description: Create a blog platform where users can write, edit, and publish posts. Include a markdown editor and image upload capability.
